reqs:
Course topic: Sleep and Dreams
Course Title: Death and Dying"Psychological issues related to death, dying, and loss, including attitudes toward death, social and cultural contexts of dying, the mental life of the dying person, palliative and hospice care, assisted suicide, and grief."
Course Title: Understanding Autism: A Clinical Perspective
Course Description: This course will explore the challenges and strengths of Autism Spectrum Disorders (ASD) across the lifespan. Special attention will be paid to the best practices for clinical intervention from birth through to supporting those with ASD in the workplace.
courseName: Contemporary Topics in Social, Developmental, Personality, and Clinical Psychology
description: A focus on the interpretation of contemporary research in social, developmental, personality, and clinical psychology.
